不過我只係一個final year 學生，未真正做過嘢，我知幾有意義都好自己都要搵到飯食 所以都仲掙扎緊。但點都好都係專心考埋試先

咁多位前輩可唔可以分享下自己個practice area同埋通常幾點收工，worklife balance如何


我只能講啲自己見識過既
有啲Area我公司無做 例如Shipping PI Crime Entertainment Immigration Wills/Probate

Corp 就收工無定時 睇需要 通常一個Deal會有Time Frame / Conditions e.g. Competition/Tax Clearance 要某個時間前趕完Due Diligence 如果Overseas就更麻煩 要追啲海外Counsels 基本上有唔少M&A要考慮既野都係分俾其他部門做 例如 Employmemt / Pensions / Tax


如果唔做M&A 平時就主要幫公司處理基本程序野 例如開股東會 安排議程 向公司註冊處入Form 有時會將啲股份轉讓重組 如果係上市公司 就更多Compliance要處理

一般話Corporate係包埋M&A 但唔包Capital Markets / Finance

咁多位前輩可唔可以分享下自己個practice area同埋通常幾點收工，worklife balance如何


我只能講啲自己見識過既
有啲Area我公司無做 例如Shipping PI Crime Entertainment Immigration Wills/Probate

Corp 就收工無定時 睇需要 通常一個Deal會有Time Frame / Conditions e.g. Competition/Tax Clearance 要某個時間前趕完Due Diligence 如果Overseas就更麻煩 要追啲海外Counsels 基本上有唔少M&A要考慮既野都係分俾其他部門做 例如 Employmemt / Pensions / Tax


如果唔做M&A 平時就主要幫公司處理基本程序野 例如開股東會 安排議程 向公司註冊處入Form 有時會將啲股份轉讓重組 如果係上市公司 就更多Compliance要處理

一般話Corporate係包埋M&A 但唔包Capital Markets / Finance


我自己係房地產 收工比較定時 最夜走係10點半
房地產 基本上都係重覆工序
土地買賣 處理租約 同 雜項
土地買賣有好多程序 例如 Title Review / Negotiate Sale Contract/Deed / Standard Enquries / 有時會有其他奇怪野 但通常Title有寫 例如有Restrictive Covenants要處理 例如要攞Planning Permission 有時要做環評
耐唔耐都要接觸Mortgagee既律師 佢地通常都有啲麻煩 因為佢地既客係投資者 要求高

租約就再複雜啲 因為賣地係一了百了 租約係有年期 所以要寫哂 User Alteration Alienation Repair Rent Review 所有正常租約要考慮既條款 如果有建築既因素 就再複雜啲 但一次生兩次熟 好快上手

其他雜項 例如 Pre-emptio Rights/Wayleave/Deposit Deeds/Option Agreememt/Licence to Assign/Alter 同一時間可以有二十個唔同既File 全部都係瑣碎細銀碼既案 但又好多 要Pick Up係好費神既事 同埋有時要接觸啲測量師建築師工程師

房地產稅 非常複雜 要識VAT SDLT同唔少Allowances/Exemption 通常都要外判 但我就自己做埋

識個做緊solit 嘅師兄話做律師好易精神緊張到早死 雖然誇咗d但而家溫書成日讀到d solit 俾人告都唔慌唔驚

無做錯野唔會無端端俾人告

Mistake 嚴重好多 as it's fundamental to the contract and will void it
Misrepresentation 係mere voidable

搞清楚先：
Mistake嘅後果係void ab initio
Misrepresentation嘅後果係voidable
Such a distinctive reason can be explained as follows:
For mistake, there is no meeting of minds of two parties either because of res extincta or res sua.
Some argue that res extincta can simply mean that the condition precedent upon the existence of a valid contract has ceased to exist before the signing of contract and hence the contract has never existed from the very beginning; whereas for res sua it is just a lack of valuable consideration such that the contract cannot come into existence without fulfilling the basic requirement of consideration. However you understand the concept of mistake, mistake simply means something fundamental to the formation of contract does not exist at the very beginning, such that the contract should not exist and should be void an initio.
For misrepresentation, it deals with the way in which consent was obtained is defective. Although both parties voluntarily enter into a contract with all the basic requirements fulfilled, the way in which the contract is formed is based on some misleading representation, such that the law gives the mere equity to the misrepresented to have the contract rescinded. Only when the mere equity can overcome all obstacles barring the rescission can a contract be validly rescinded. Voidable in other words simply means one cannot take the 'void an initio' legal consequence as granted, as it is always subject to the barring factors of rescission, i.e laches, restitution in integrum, right of equity's darling (a bona fide purchaser of legal interest for value without notice), etc.

我想入黎問書既
有冇巴打可以講下contract law 黎講點樣先可以有效地分到misrepresentation定mistake 除左inducing同wrong assumption之外仲可以點分


程度上唔同
Mistake 嚴重好多 as it's fundamental to the contract and will void it
Misrepresentation 係mere voidable
有錯勿屌

搞清楚先：
Mistake嘅後果係void ab initio
Misrepresentation嘅後果係voidable
Such a distinctive reason can be explained as follows:
For mistake, there is no meeting of minds of two parties either because of res extincta or res sua.
Some argue that res extincta can simply mean that the condition precedent upon the existence of a valid contract has ceased to exist before the signing of contract and hence the contract has never existed from the very beginning; whereas for res sua it is just a lack of valuable consideration such that the contract cannot come into existence without fulfilling the basic requirement of consideration. However you understand the concept of mistake, mistake simply means something fundamental to the formation of contract does not exist at the very beginning, such that the contract should not exist and should be void an initio.
For misrepresentation, it deals with the way in which consent was obtained is defective. Although both parties voluntarily enter into a contract with all the basic requirements fulfilled, the way in which the contract is formed is based on some misleading representation, such that the law gives the mere equity to the misrepresented to have the contract rescinded. Only when the mere equity can overcome all obstacles barring the rescission can a contract be validly rescinded. Voidable in other words simply means one cannot take the 'void an initio' legal consequence as granted, as it is always subject to the barring factors of rescission, i.e laches, restitution in integrum, right of equity's darling (a bona fide purchaser of legal interest for value without notice), etc.

有無人做過construction或者shipping?
contentious or non-contentious都得，想聽下前輩分享下呢兩個sectors嘅前景/工時/文化等等

Construction

contruction黎講睇你做邊個市場

如果淨做HK既話機會可能會變少

但係有幸入到IFIRM就唔同講法

因為好多國際PROJECT(如基建)既contentious都會係HK做ADR

但又有新加坡爭米

一句講哂你有料就唔怕冇得撈

so far做得開唔開心?鍾唔鍾意呢個sector?
既然巴打係做construction，又好似開過post話去日本做野，好似得兩三間construction law ifirm係香港同日本都有office?
btw係non-contentious方面 (例如financing/transactional)，工作性質會唔會同general financing/transactional無乜分別?


利申:唔係ifirm

non-contentious 其實包好多野
又有唔同既利益方

譬如有發展方, CONTRACTOR, BANK/FUNDER等等

幫每一方做既野都唔同

但離不開contract drafting negotiation 同整 debenture不等

我FIRM個客就係日本既大 CONTRACTOR

試過幫手做consortium agreement / JV agreement做到死

廢事講到咁揚，不過問心我覺得一位1987 call，姓鍾嘅counsel應該滿足到你 (不過佢唔係好多legal aid)

其實跟邊個都好，你想師父肯教肯比你試，最緊要你要識問，識向師父爭取機會比你去試 (咁當然唔好交啲柒嘅課啦 )

好彩有野assign比你，就一定要盡力做到最好，因為你做錯唔單止自己柒(柒野係可以傳千里)，你師父用左你做錯嘅野後果真係可以好嚴重

如果師父同期有pupil嘅話，不妨問下有無野幫到手，即使係最logistic最唔需要legal knowledge嘅工作，其實都學到野

只要你交到一次好貨，師父又用到，自然有第二次幫佢嘅機會，到你兩個禮拜完覺得想stay，自然大機會啲extend啦

廢事講到咁揚，不過問心我覺得一位1987 call，姓鍾嘅counsel應該滿足到你 (不過佢唔係好多legal aid)

其實跟邊個都好，你想師父肯教肯比你試，最緊要你要識問，識向師父爭取機會比你去試 (咁當然唔好交啲柒嘅課啦 )

好彩有野assign比你，就一定要盡力做到最好，因為你做錯唔單止自己柒(柒野係可以傳千里)，你師父用左你做錯嘅野後果真係可以好嚴重

如果師父同期有pupil嘅話，不妨問下有無野幫到手，即使係最logistic最唔需要legal knowledge嘅工作，其實都學到野

只要你交到一次好貨，師父又用到，自然有第二次幫佢嘅機會，到你兩個禮拜完覺得想stay，自然大機會啲extend啦


多謝巴打
有時我覺得爭取真係好難拿捏 應該點樣去表達
我唔想師傅覺得我係認叻認屎認屁
不過我都真係每次都有認真做 都有師傅完左pupillage 會打畀我叫我幫手（雖然只係手板眼見工夫）

但係點開口問可唔可以留耐啲
咁如果其實佢好唔想見到我
但我又咁樣開口問 咁咪好強人所難

有無人做過construction或者shipping?
contentious or non-contentious都得，想聽下前輩分享下呢兩個sectors嘅前景/工時/文化等等

Construction

contruction黎講睇你做邊個市場

如果淨做HK既話機會可能會變少

但係有幸入到IFIRM就唔同講法

因為好多國際PROJECT(如基建)既contentious都會係HK做ADR

但又有新加坡爭米

一句講哂你有料就唔怕冇得撈

so far做得開唔開心?鍾唔鍾意呢個sector?
既然巴打係做construction，又好似開過post話去日本做野，好似得兩三間construction law ifirm係香港同日本都有office?
btw係non-contentious方面 (例如financing/transactional)，工作性質會唔會同general financing/transactional無乜分別?


利申:唔係ifirm

non-contentious 其實包好多野
又有唔同既利益方

譬如有發展方, CONTRACTOR, BANK/FUNDER等等

幫每一方做既野都唔同

但離不開contract drafting negotiation 同整 debenture不等

我FIRM個客就係日本既大 CONTRACTOR

試過幫手做consortium agreement / JV agreement做到死

construction sector對我而言都幾有吸引力，正好下個星期有間construction law firm internship比我interview，希望呢個summer可以再學多d野擴闊下眼界

咁多位前輩可唔可以分享下自己個practice area同埋通常幾點收工，worklife balance如何


我只能講啲自己見識過既
有啲Area我公司無做 例如Shipping PI Crime Entertainment Immigration Wills/Probate

Corp 就收工無定時 睇需要 通常一個Deal會有Time Frame / Conditions e.g. Competition/Tax Clearance 要某個時間前趕完Due Diligence 如果Overseas就更麻煩 要追啲海外Counsels 基本上有唔少M&A要考慮既野都係分俾其他部門做 例如 Employmemt / Pensions / Tax


如果唔做M&A 平時就主要幫公司處理基本程序野 例如開股東會 安排議程 向公司註冊處入Form 有時會將啲股份轉讓重組 如果係上市公司 就更多Compliance要處理

一般話Corporate係包埋M&A 但唔包Capital Markets / Finance


我自己係房地產 收工比較定時 最夜走係10點半
房地產 基本上都係重覆工序
土地買賣 處理租約 同 雜項
土地買賣有好多程序 例如 Title Review / Negotiate Sale Contract/Deed / Standard Enquries / 有時會有其他奇怪野 但通常Title有寫 例如有Restrictive Covenants要處理 例如要攞Planning Permission 有時要做環評
耐唔耐都要接觸Mortgagee既律師 佢地通常都有啲麻煩 因為佢地既客係投資者 要求高

租約就再複雜啲 因為賣地係一了百了 租約係有年期 所以要寫哂 User Alteration Alienation Repair Rent Review 所有正常租約要考慮既條款 如果有建築既因素 就再複雜啲 但一次生兩次熟 好快上手

其他雜項 例如 Pre-emptio Rights/Wayleave/Deposit Deeds/Option Agreememt/Licence to Assign/Alter 同一時間可以有二十個唔同既File 全部都係瑣碎細銀碼既案 但又好多 要Pick Up係好費神既事 同埋有時要接觸啲測量師建築師工程師

房地產稅 非常複雜 要識VAT SDLT同唔少Allowances/Exemption 通常都要外判 但我就自己做埋

係政府做conveyancing路過
